meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of a deacon.
meanings.sent1: The diaconal duties included helping those in need within the community.
meanings.sent2: The church recognized her diaconal service with a special award.
meanings.sent3: The diaconal deacon wore a smile as bright as the sun.
meanings.sent4: Her diaconal spirit shone through her acts of kindness.
meanings.sent5: The diaconal role required compassion and dedication.

meanings.definition: Involving or relating to the work or ministry of a deacon.
meanings.sent1: The diaconal responsibilities required regular visits to the sick.
meanings.sent2: He attended a diaconal training program to better serve the church.
meanings.sent3: The diaconal deacon juggled his duties with grace and humor.
meanings.sent4: Her diaconal approach to charity work inspired many in the community.
meanings.sent5: The diaconal ministry aimed to uplift and support those in need.
